info.Sponsored Research: The research work entitled "Development of Tool Based Micromilling/Microdrilling Machine with Piezoactuated Workpiece Feeding System" presented by Muralidhara, Rathnamala Rao, and Veeresha R. K. has been awarded FIRST PRIZE at Academia- Industry Pavilion at International Machine Tool Exhibition-2015 (IMTEX-2015) organized by Indian Machine Tool Manufacturers' Association (IMTMA) at Bangalore International Convention Center from 22nd to 28th January, 2015.The research work entitled "Development of Micro-Electro-Discharge machine (Micro-EDM) with Piezoactuated Tool Feed System" presented by Muralidhara, Rathnamala Rao, T. R. Venugopal has been judged as the fifth best research work among the 24 Institutions who participated in Academia-Industry Pavilion at International Machine Tool Exhibition -2014 (IMTEX-2014).Dr. Muralidhara received the "Certificate of Achievement" from Indian Society for Technical Education, India for having guided the Best M.Tech Thesis (Second Prize) titled "Design and Development of Ground Contact Sensing Biped Foot" at 44th ISTE Annual Convention, held at College of Engineering, Trivandrum, during 27th to 29th November, 2014.The research paper entitled "Experimental investigations on active vibration isolation using piezoelectric actuators" has won the "Best Paper Award" at International Conference on Advanced Computing and Communication Systems, organized at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering, Coimbatore, India, during 19th-21st December 2013.The research paper entitled "Investigations on proposed tool wear compensation technique for micro-electro discharge machining of silicon" has won the "Best Paper Award" at International Conference on MEMS, organized at IIT Madras, Chennai, India, during 3rd - 5th January 2009.The research paper entitled "Design and development of an anthropomorphic foot for humanoid robot" has won the "Best Paper Award" in Mechanical Engineering Stream at International Conference on Emerging Trends in Engineering, organized at NMAMIT, Nitte, during 15th to 17th May 2014The M.Tech. Project entitled "Design fabrication and testing of micropump manufactured using tool based micromachining process" guided by Dr. Muralidhara has been awarded "FIRST PRIZE" in the M.Tech. Project Exhibition-2015 held at NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte.The research paper based on this M.Tech. Project entitled "Theoretical investigations on piezowafer actuated micropump" has been awarded as "Best Paper" in the Mechanical Engineering stream in the International Conference on Emerging Trends in Engineering (ICETE - 2015) held at NMAMIT, Nitte during 8th-9th May 2015. This M.Tech. Project received "FIRST PRIZE" in M.Tech. Project Competition "I2 CONNECT" organized by IEEE Mangalore Sub-Section, held at NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte, on 30th May 2015.The research work entitled "Development of Tool Based Micromilling/Microdrilling Machine with Piezoactuated Workpiece Feeding System" presented by Muralidhara, Rathnamala Rao, and Veeresha R. K. has been awarded "FIRST PRIZE" at Academia- Industry Pavilion at International Machine Tool Exhibition-2015 (IMTEX-2015) organized by Indian Machine Tool Manufacturers' Association (IMTMA) at Bangalore International Convention Center from 22nd to 28th January 2015.The final year B.E. project entitled "Implementation of CNC controls for mini CNC surface grinding machine" guided by Dr. Muralidhara has been awarded "Commendation prize" in the B.E. Project Expro-2016 held at NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte.The M.Tech. Project entitled "Design, Fabrication and Testing of Tool Feeding system for In-situ Tool grinding in micro EDM" has been awarded "FIRST PRIZE" in non-circuit stream of M.Tech. Project Competition "I2 CONECCT" organized by IEEE Mangalore Sub-Section, held at Canara Engineering College, Mangalore, on 14th May 2016.The research work entitled "Design Fabrication and testing of Piezo actuator based workpiece feeding system for CNC Micro-Milling Machine" has been judged as the "First Consolation Prize" among the Institutions who participated in Academia-Industry Pavilion at International Machine Tool Exhibition -2017 (IMTEX-2017).The research work entitled "Two axis TIG welding of Aluminium alloy with synchronized pulsating wire feeder" carried out by Dr. Muralidhara and dr. Vijeesh Vijayan  has won "2nd best research work"award among the research projects presented by 50 different institutions from different parts of India who have participated in the Industry-Academia Pavilion at IMTEX-2020.

info.Achievement: The research work entitled "Investigation on mechanical micromachining process with piezoactuated machining depth control and its application on MEMS device fabrication" presented by Muralidhara, Rathnamala Rao, Veeresha R. K has been awarded FIRST PRIZE at Academia Industry Pavilllion at International Machine Tool Exhibition-2015 (IMTEX-2015) organized by Indian Machine Tool Manufacturer's Association (IMTMA-2015) at Bangalore International Conventional Center from 22nd to 28th January, 2015. This award includes a Certificate and a cash prize of Rs, 50,000/-The research work entitled "Design, Fabrication and Testing of piezoactuator based workpiecec feeding system for CNC Micro-milling machine" has been awarded FIRST CONSOLATION PRIZE at Academia Industry Pavilllion at International Machine Tool Exhibition-2017 (IMTEX-2017) organized by Indian Machine Tool Manufacturer's Association (IMTMA-2017) at Bangalore International Conventional Center during 26th January to 1st February, 2017. This award includes a Certificate and a cash prize.Final Year project title "Design and Fabrication of Agarbatti Counting and Packing Machine" was got second prize in EXPRO-2014, at NMAMIT, Nitte
